name: Riding in my Car Car
description:
Uh yes, summer time.  Did you ever just sit in the car at a red light and tap to the music on the radio.?  Enjoy some original retro game style jams as you tap to the rhythm in this fun tapping game.

But there's a twist.

Music speed and tapping rhythm will increase with streaks up to "INSANITY" before dropping back to normal speed if you break the streak.

It's a little challenging at first but remember to tap in rhythm.

Pick your favourite city and music style.

Remember it's about the steady rhythm of tapping with the music.

Enjoy!
